name: House Haunters (catofPolyphemus, AFNarratives)
description:
You’re the new House Haunter. Halloween is tomorrow, so we need you to work on this house last minute. Got a lovely vampire family moving in tomorrow. You’re a newbie, but the job’s easy. Just wreck the place. Do your best, and don’t give up!

Credits:
This game was created for the Wholesome Games Jam 2020 by Team Diamond Days

Adanna Nedd (@AFNarratives8): Writing, Graphic Design, Sound Finder 

Chelsea Sanchez (@catofPolyphemus): Game Design, Programming, QA Testing

Background Music: Track One - Ludum Dare 38 by Abstraction (@abstraction)

Creepy by Benjamin Tissot (www.bensound.com)

Sprites: Kenney Furniture and Animal Pack by Kenney (Kenney.nl)
